info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 4:58AM EST until further notice by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River at Stevenson Dam. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Moderate flood stage with numerous homes in the Maples area of Shelton affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:30 AM EST Monday the stage was 10.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning and continue rising to a crest of 14.9 feet this afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Stevenson Dam Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Mon 4 am: 10.2 Forecast: Mon 7 am 11.5 Mon 1 pm 14.9 Mon 7 pm 14.8 Tue 1 am 14.8 Tue 7 am 14.8 Tue 1 pm 14.8 Tue 7 pm 14.8 Wed 1 am 14.8 Wed 7 am 13.1 Wed 1 pm 13.1 Wed 7 pm 13.1 Thu 1 am 13.0 &&
